statements: SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY incident_id;
SELECT DISTINCT incident_type FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM security_incidents GROUP BY incident_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;

SELECT incident_id, incident_date, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(affected_entities) AS num_affected_entities FROM security_incidents WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(affected_entities) > 5 ORDER BY num_affected_entities DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, impact FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM BreachDetails WHERE breach_type = 'Phishing Attack' ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT organization, breach_type FROM BreachDetails WHERE data_type = 'Personal Information' LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, impact, incident_date, description FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type='Data Breach';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE impact='High' AND incident_type='Data Breach';
SELECT organization, breach_type FROM BreachDetails ORDER BY breach_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM breach_details WHERE breach_type = 'Unauthorized Access' AND affected_records > 1000;
SELECT report_date, reporter_name FROM breach_reports WHERE report_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' AND incident_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT security_incidents.incident_id, security_incidents.incident_date, breach_details.breach_type, breach_reports.reporter_name FROM security_incidents JOIN breach_details ON security_incidents.incident_id = breach_details.incident_id JOIN breach_reports ON breach_details.breach_id = breach_reports.breach_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Phishing Attack';

SELECT breach_reports.report_id, breach_reports.report_date, breach_reports.reporter_name, breach_details.breach_type, security_incidents.incident_date FROM breach_reports LEFT JOIN breach_details ON breach_reports.breach_id = breach_details.breach_id LEFT JOIN security_incidents ON breach_details.incident_id = security_incidents.incident_id ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents;
SELECT * FROM breach_details WHERE breach_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT entity_name, entity_type, impact_level FROM affected_entities WHERE entity_type = 'Customer';
SELECT investigator_name, log_date, log_details FROM investigation_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_date, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Phishing Attack';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM breach_details WHERE breach_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT entity_name, impact_level FROM affected_entities WHERE entity_type = 'Company';
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM affected_entities WHERE entity_type = 'Organization';
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM security_measures WHERE measure_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;

SELECT i.incident_type, e.entity_name, m.measure_name FROM incidents i JOIN incident_details id ON i.incident_id = id.incident_id JOIN security_measures m ON id.measure_id = m.measure_id JOIN affected_entities e ON id.entity_id = e.entity_id;
SELECT * FROM incidents
SELECT incident_type, incident_date FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT incident_id, location FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Security Breach'

SELECT entity_name, entity_description, measure_name FROM affected_entities JOIN incident_details ON affected_entities.entity_id = incident_details.entity_id JOIN security_mejsonures ON security_measures.measure_id = incident_details.measure_id
SELECT * FROM incident_details WHERE notes IS NOT NULL ORDER BY detail_id ASC
